projects.title: Greener Than You Think | ElleHacks 25'
projects.description: A friendly, cute web application as a comfort zone for adolescents. Want to have your own mini garden? Let your thoughts go? Then, Greener than you think is your to go! Made using HTML + CSS + JS.

projects.title: Screen Sage | GenAI 25'
projects.description: A simple, AI-powered tool that generates interview questions, scores responses, and gives feedback—helping candidates improve and aiding fairer hiring decisions.
